plot outline: Sameera(Amrita Acharya) is an orphan who does not enjoy life and saves all her income for the future. As time passes by, she gets affected by a deadly disease and doctors say that she has only a few months left in her life. Upset with this, she decides to enjoy the rest of the time and leaves to Thailand.
title: Sameeram
plot: Sameera(Amrita Acharya) is an orphan who does not enjoy life and saves all her income for the future.
